package.name: Facturante
package.summary: Magento Module 100% integrated in your platform. If your ecommerce site is developed in Magento and you need to apply electronic invoice the API of Facturante will be the most suitable and economical alternative. You can easily invoice without wasting time on the interpretation of official regulations and without wasting money on countable advice and skilled programmers- who charge you for maintaining AFIP´s regulations and adjustment in force (AFIP = the Argentine Tax Authority) - Through Facturante you will be able to invoice from the order list and to monitor the shipment statement on real time. You also will be able to issue either final consumer invoices or VAT invoices with automatic calculation of Argentinean tax variation (National and Province)
package.description:
Magento Module 100% integrated in your platform. If your ecommerce site is developed in Magento and you need to apply electronic invoice the API of Facturante will be the most suitable and economical alternative. You can easily invoice without wasting time on the interpretation of official regulations and without wasting money on countable advice and skilled programmers- who charge you for maintaining AFIP´s regulations and adjustment in force (AFIP = the Argentine Tax Authority) - Through Facturante you will be able to invoice from the order list and to monitor the shipment statement on real time. You also will be able to issue either final consumer invoices or VAT invoices with automatic calculation of Argentinean tax variation (National and Province) In a short period of time you´ll be invoicing without neglecting your business because that will be our job. Our Special Features: Our service has been developed, tested and already in use for five years now. We secured the issue of all invoices request through our internal engine of requests -of type FIFO- which has a quick automatic clean up We rectify errors before sending the invoice to AFIP showing an easy error´s interpretation for the user The issued invoice delivery is automated , with each step of the creation, reading and payment process It allows to invoice with multiple companies and easily sign them at ERP/SAP We constantly updated the platform to come up to the required regulations. We detect and resolve new errors cases We resolve the connection, interpretations and inconsistencies of the AFIP service (Missing invoices, internal errors, etc.) and the invoice process is not interrupted by AFIP Automatic registration of invoices in ERP. Processes of bach and invoices duplication are prevented Communication with AFIP services is automatically reestablished in order to give you the opportunity to invoice 24 hours a day Detect the suspension of AFIP service, and automatic regeneration of the pending invoices when the service is reestablished Communication between Facturante and AFIP is automatic and reduced to only one request Electronic invoice duplicated is storage (PDF)
Trough the integration we offer: testing environment monitor API Health of Facturante and AFIP (testing and production environments) technical paperwork about integration and configuration SAP expert consultancy MAGENTO expert consultancy different languages models professional support
